revised_title: Groundwater Variations and Malaria Incidence in Chotta Nagpur, Bengal
tldr: This study examines the relationship between variations in groundwater levels and the incidence of malarial fevers in Chotta Nagpur, Bengal. The research aims to understand how changes in groundwater can impact the spread of malaria and inform public health strategies to mitigate the disease.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Public Health
